features: Upgraded Office chair cylinder replacement: More effort- saving handle accessories, no tools required, no need to disassemble your chair gas lift cylinder. (Package does NOT include the cylinder.)
Office chair replacement parts, Install with bare hands. If it's not tight enough by hand, try using a screwdriver to get it as tight as possible.
The height of the chair can be adjusted and fixed according to your needs.
Universal suitable for most office chairs, the cylinder diameter is within 25-28mm.
Exceeding other low-quality plastic products on the market, the stainless steel material does not need to worry about cracking.
Fix your sinking chair, solve your worries and save the high cost of a new chair.
Updated the handle accessories, which can save more effort. You can use it according to your needs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Upgraded Office chair cylinder replacement, More effort-saving handle accessories NO need to disassemble your chair gas lift cylinder. The height of the chair can be adjusted and fixed according to your needs. Fix your sinking chair, solve your worries and save the high cost of a new chair. If you are already tired of a sinking chair, try our Office Chair Saver,it can solve this annoying problem. Installation method: Enclose our product around the cylinder at the height you want, and then tighten the handle as tight as possible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and works great! No more sitting low. Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works. No sinking chair
reviews.reviewText: The product works. Just clamp it at your desired height and tighten. It might damage the gas cylinder rod, but who cares.. the gas cylinder is on its last legs anyway. Tighten away...This is way cheaper than buying another office chair. And this is way easier than trying to find a replacement gas cylinder that fits your chair. The dis-assembly of the old gas cylinder also looks like a pita to take off...Tip: you should just an extra long screwdriver for leverage to tighten it down extra tight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t work -update it does
reviews.reviewText: Not much more to it, it doesn’t stop my chair from sinking. No matter how tight I screw it my chair still sinks. Pretty disappointing.Update- I was wrong. I wasn’t tightening it hard enough. I took a screwdriver and turned it as tight as I could and it’s been working for a couple days. I am wildly relieved. It didn’t come with instructions though so I didn’t know originally.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars does the job

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had hope for this but it just doesnt work. I got it as tight as I could but it still starts to slip by the end of the day. It is pretty rugged and its built well, but it just cant grip the cylinder hard enough to keep it from slipping down. I even used to screwdriver to turn the screw to the point where I thought it was going to snap or crush the cylinder but it still didnt grip enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Chair No Longer a Low Rider
reviews.reviewText: This product is great! I was tired of raising my office chair every 20 minutes as it kept going into low rider mode. This product was simple to attach and now my chair stays up where I want it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I cannot attest to comfort, sturdiness or value. I can say this is a heavy weight clamp and it seems to be working as advertised. I am a big boy so I will see how long it holds up. 2/7/22. EZ to apply. I recommend this over the 2 screw clamp.***2/8/22 So far this clamp holds tight. Make sure you clean all oil of the saft with a solvent of some kind. And snug the thumbscrew by hand. Test it for tightness and tighten some more. Do not over tighten. I like this product.*** 2/10/22 Not as secure as advertised. Post still slips through the clamp, but is better than without it. I will rough up the post to see if that helps.>>>To the seller/manufacturer: What will happen if I raise the post all the way and then drill a hole in the post just above the clamp? If I place a screw in the wall of the post, the post cannot slip down.March 6: Can't say I like it. It is not strong enough for my use. The only way this will work is if you are about 150 pounds and drill a screw hole in the tube so the clamp cannot slip down. Definitely NOT worth MY money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars "UP, UP and STAY"
reviews.reviewText: My office chair had lost its capability to stay at one height and my chair was adjusted up in the morning but slowly went down by the afternoon and the change was very slow. This device was easy to install and be sure to tighten it until you can tighten it no more and it has been "UP, UP and Stay for the past two weeks+".Much less expensive than a new chair.
